trans-unit.source: Provides facilities for managing and interacting with the Text Services Framework, which provides support for alternate text input methods such as speech and handwriting.
Gets a value that indicates whether or not this input method can display configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
**true** if configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
This property has no default value.
Gets a value that indicates whether this input method can display word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
**true** if word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)] can be displayed; otherwise, **false**.
This property has no default value.
Gets a reference to any currently active input method associated with the current context.
A reference to an <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod"></xref> object associated with the current context, or **null** if there is no active input method.
This property has no default value.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the input scope.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> object representing the current input scope for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref>.
The current value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref>.
The current value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Returns the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> attached property for a specified dependency object.
The dependency object for which to retrieve the value of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref>.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> for the specified dependency object.
Raised when target is **null**.
Gets or sets the current state of handwriting input for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current input method state for handwriting input.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState.Off"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current conversion mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration specifying the conversion mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues.Alphanumeric"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current sentence mode for the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues"></xref> enumerations specifying the sentence mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeSentenceModeValues.None"></xref>.
Gets or sets the current state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the state of the input method editor associated with this input method.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState.Off"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> attached property.
Gets or sets the current state of microphone input for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState"></xref> enumeration specifying the current input method state for microphone input.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethodState.Off"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> attached property.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> attached property.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope"></xref> attached property.
An <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputScope"></xref> object representing the new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.InputScope"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> attached property.
The new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodEnabled"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> attached property.
The new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.IsInputMethodSuspended"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeConversionMode"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeSentenceMode"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Sets the value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> attached property on the specified dependency object.
The dependency object on which to set the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> attached property.

A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.ImeConversionModeValues"></xref> enumeration representing the new value for the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.PreferredImeState"></xref> attached property.
Raised when target is **null**.
Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

Displays configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service, using a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
This parameter can be `null`.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.
Accepts a specified string as the default value to register.
Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
A string that specifies a value to register.
Displays word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] associated with the currently active keyboard text service.

Accepts a specified string as the default value to register, and a specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as the parent element for the configuration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
Typically the value specified by *registeredText* is used to pre-populate the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)].
A <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that will be used as the parent element for the word registration [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-ui-md.md)].
This parameter can be `null`.
A string that specifies a value to register.
Gets or sets the speech mode for this input method.
A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode"></xref> enumeration specifying the current speech mode.
The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Input.SpeechMode.Indeterminate"></xref>.
Occurs when the input method state (represented by the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.InputMethod.ImeState"></xref> property) changes.
